text: 1:11 Matyu 24:30; 26:64; Luk 21:27; Jon 14:3; 1 Tesalonika 1:10; 4:16; Akar Mogomem 1:7Egha aning kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Galilin gumaziba, ia tizim bagha kagh tuivighav ikia pɨn overiamɨn gari? Gumazir kam Iesus, God a inizɨ a ia ategha uan Nguibamɨn ghu. Ia an ganizɨ a Godɨn Nguibamɨn ghuzɨ moghɨn, kamaghɨra a uamategham.”
